Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing the off-street parking requirement for base station licenses
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Removing the off-street parking requirement for base station licenses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting for hire vehicles from charging excessive rates.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting for hire vehicles from charging excessive rates.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agreements between livery base stations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing the taxi and limousine commission to consider improved trouble lights for use in licensed vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing the taxi and limousine commission to consider improved trouble lights for use in licensed vehicles.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
